relation: I participate in intermural sports, as well as work out there. Mostly i am doing research with my professors.
They have different styles of food, but not the healthiest food to eat.
I take the hardest classes possible so i can be the best prepared to face the real world.

Make sure to find something that you love doing, it does not matter how much money you can make as long as you are passionate about it. The opportunities professor present to you to help out, try as hard as possible to be involved in activities inside your major it will help to network and get your name out there.

William Paterson has one of the best Kinesiology programs in New jersey. Classes are small and the professors keep student involved in research studies they do. Once settled in the major, the relationship between students and professors is like a small family.
pageTitle: William Paterson University of New Jersey Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {122013=The dorms are kind of old and there's always some kind of problem- including fire alarms at 3:00 AM., 283644=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 91448=Every Tuesday and Thursday from 12:30-2:00 pm we have something called common hour. During common hour nobody has classes. Usually various clubs are holding functions with free food and music. Also you can join various clubs and learn and attend all the events they hold. All the sports at Willy P are competitive division III athletics. There are plenty of fun things to do on campus you just have to look for it., 41333=it exists; however, i don't know much about it yet. i have just received an email to join them by the end of february, so i will know more afterwards., 225583=Our usual traditions are every Tuesday and Thursday called common hour. This is a time where all students don't have class from 12:15-1:45 and the university sets up activities so all the students can come and enjoy and even son outsiders as well. All are welcomed!}

textAfterTable: Rukshana from Paterson, NJ 12/31/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 9 out of 18 people found this review useful. 2 people found this inaccurate. 2 of 73 Categories Comments Great for these types of students It's a college for every types of students. No matter what you major in, you will defiantly enjoy it. Tips for prospective students First of all, welcome to William Paterson University. If you have any problems with anything, just go to the college website and search for the phone numbers of that certain field and call them, they will solve your problems as soon as possible. Also, join clubs. Bang for the buck I'm really satisfied with the fees. I get financial aid and it covered everything, from tuition fees to books. Am enjoying being here I'm really glad I came here. Every people here are very helpful and friendly. They make it easier for first year students, such as myself to accustom with
